mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.bingli_uuid_number as bingliUuidNumber ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.jiancha_time as jianchaTime ,a.bingrenzishu_content as bingrenzishuContent ,a.jianchajieguo_content as jianchajieguoContent ,a.yishengkaifang_content as yishengkaifangContent ,a.yishengjianyi_content as yishengjianyiContent ,a.bingli_yibao as bingliYibao ,a.huafeijine as huafeijine ,a.xiacijiuzhen_time as xiacijiuzhenTime ,a.bingli_nianling as bingliNianling ,a.bingli_types as bingliTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yisheng.zuozhen_shijian as zuozhenShijian ,yisheng.keshi_types as keshiTypes ,yisheng.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,yisheng.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,yisheng.yisheng_content as yishengContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM bingli a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.bingli_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingliUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiancha_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jianchaTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiancha_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jianchaTimeEnd})
and a.bingrenzishu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingrenzishuContent},'%')
and a.jianchajieguo_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianchajieguoContent},'%')
and a.yishengkaifang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengkaifangContent},'%')
and a.yishengjianyi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengjianyiContent},'%')
and a.bingli_yibao like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingliYibao},'%')
and a.huafeijine >= #{params.huafeijineStart}
and a.huafeijine <= #{params.huafeijineEnd}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiacijiuzhen_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiacijiuzhenTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiacijiuzhen_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiacijiuzhenTimeEnd})
and a.bingli_nianling >= #{params.bingliNianlingStart}
and a.bingli_nianling <= #{params.bingliNianlingEnd}
and a.bingli_nianling = #{params.bingliNianling}
and a.bingli_types = #{params.bingliTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and yisheng.zuozhen_shijian like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuozhenShijian},'%')
and yisheng.keshi_types = #{params.keshiTypes}
and yisheng.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and yisheng.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
